description.jp: 召喚士一族の生き残りの 明るくおませな女の子。幼くして家族を亡くし召喚士の村マダイン・サリでひっそりと暮らしていたが ジタンたちとの出会いをきっかけに旅立ちを決意。縁あるガーネットらとの交流を通し 抱えていた寂しさを克服した。
description.gl: A mirthful and precocious young summoner who is the last survivor of her tribe. After losing her family at a tender age, she quietly lives in the village of Madain Sari until a fateful encounter with Zidane's party inspires her to move on. Only through bonding with Garnet is she finally able to overcome her loneliness.

jp.text: なんかこいつむかつくわっ！\nやっつけちゃっていい？
自分の気持ちに\nウソついちゃダメなの！
レディに対して\nなんてことするのよっ！
もうっ！\nニブチンなんだからっ！
エーコはいつだって\n元気いっぱいよ！
素敵！\nろまんちっくだわ！
大事なもの守るんだから！\n大好きな人たちを守るんだから！

gl.text: He's really ticking me off! Can I kill him?
You should never lie to yourself.
This is no way to treat a lady!
We live to protect the ones we love!

desc.gl:
Phoenix Pinion: • Slightly raises party's MAX BRV
• Slightly increases party's HP damage dealt
• Grants party Holy Enchant effect
• Moderately increases party's BRV damage dealt
• Slightly increases own HP damage dealt
Does not increase based on level
Does not stack with special effects of same name

• Triggers following Rebirth Flame when taking attack while special effect Phoenix Pinion at least 1 and party member's HP less than 50% of MAX:
 • Moderately restores party's HP, revives fallen allies
 • Grants party BRV based on own INT BRV
 • 4-hit group magic BRV attack + group HP attack delivered 3 times
 • Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
 • Deals total HP damage to each target
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
 • Increases BRV by 20% of cumulative HP damage dealt after each HP attack excluding last HP attack
 • Reduces special effect Phoenix Pinion by 1

desc.gl: HP Regen: Restores certain amount of HP
desc.jp: HPリジェネ：HPを一定量回復する

desc.gl: ATK Up: Raises ATK
desc.jp: 攻撃力アップ：攻撃力が上昇する

desc.gl: MAX BRV Up: Raises MAX BRV
desc.jp: 最大BRVアップ：最大BRVが上昇する

desc.gl:
Phoenix Pinion: • Slightly raises party's MAX BRV
• Slightly increases party's HP damage dealt
• Grants party Holy Enchant effect
• Moderately increases party's BRV damage dealt
• Slightly increases own HP damage dealt
Does not increase based on level
Does not stack with special effects of same name

• Triggers following Rebirth Flame when taking attack while special effect Phoenix Pinion at least 1 and party member's HP less than 50% of MAX:
 • Moderately restores party's HP, revives fallen allies
 • Grants party BRV based on own INT BRV
 • 4-hit group magic BRV attack + group HP attack delivered 3 times
 • Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
 • Deals total HP damage to each target
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
 • Increases BRV by 20% of cumulative HP damage dealt after each HP attack excluding last HP attack
 • Reduces special effect Phoenix Pinion by 1
desc.jp:
フェニックスの羽：味方全員の最大BRV 与えるHPダメージを小アップし エンチャント・聖効果
味方全員の与えるBRVダメージを中アップ
自身の与えるHPダメージ小アップ （段階に応じて効果は上昇しない）（同名の特殊効果は重複しない）
特殊効果「フェニックスの羽」1以上の時かつ敵の攻撃を受けて
味方の誰かのHPが最大HPの50％未満の時 以下の「転生の炎」が発動
味方全員のHPを中回復 蘇生も行う
味方全員に自身の初期BRVに依存した量のBRVを加算し
4HIT全体魔法BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃を3回行う
攻撃対象が単体の時 与えるBRVダメージ中アップ 与えるHPダメージは等倍
奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する 上限は自身の最大BRVの150％分
最後のHP攻撃を除く HP攻撃後 与えた合計HPダメージの20％分 自身のBRVをアップさせる
特殊効果「フェニックスの羽」1消費

desc.gl:
Phoenix Pinion: • Slightly raises party's MAX BRV
• Slightly increases party's HP damage dealt
• Grants party Holy Enchant effect

Does not increase based on level

 • Reduces special effect Phoenix Pinion by 1

desc.gl:
When using Rebirth Flame:
 • Moderate boost to BRV granted based on own INT BRV
 • 8-hit group magic BRV attack + group HP attack becomes 4-hit group magic BRV attack + group HP attack delivered 3 times; largely increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Increases BRV by 20% of cumulative HP damage dealt after each HP attack excluding last HP attack

Slight boost to increased BRV damage dealt from special effect Phoenix Pinion

Adds following effects to special effect Phoenix Pinion:
 • Slightly raises party's MAX BRV
 • Slightly increases own HP damage dealt
Does not increase with level
desc.jp:
「転生の炎」使用時
・初期BRV依存のBRV加算量中アップ
・8HIT全体魔法BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃が
　4HIT全体魔法BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃を3回行う変化し
　合計BRV威力も大アップ
・最後のHP攻撃を除く HP攻撃後 
　与えた合計HPダメージの20％分 自身のBRVをアップさせる

特殊効果「フェニックスの羽」の与えるBRVダメージアップの効果小アップ

特殊効果「フェニックスの羽」に以下の効果が追加
・味方全員の最大BRV小アップ
・自身の与えるHPダメージ小アップ
　（段階によって効果は上昇しない）
